verses.verse: וַֽעֲתַלְיָה֙ <S%H6271><s%> va-'a-tal-Yah And when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> 'em the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <S%H274><s%> 'a-chaz-Ya-hu, of Ahaziah; וּרָאֲתָה u-ra-'a-tah כרָאֲתָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> ra-'a-Tah advise self קכִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> met was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <S%H1121><s%> be-Nah; that her son וַתָּ֙קָם֙ <S%H6965><s%> vat-Ta-kom she arose וַתְּאַבֵּ֔ד <S%H6><s%> vat-te-'ab-Bed, and destroyed אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> Ze-ra' all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָֽה׃ <S%H4467><s%> ham-mam-la-Chah. royal

וַתִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> vat-tik-Kach took יְהוֹשֶׁ֣בַע <S%H3089><s%> ye-ho-She-va' But Jehosheba בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> bat- the daughter הַמֶּֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech- of king י֠וֹרָם <S%H3141><s%> Yo-rom Joram אֲח֨וֹת <S%H269><s%> a-Chot sister אֲחַזְיָ֜הוּ <S%H274><s%> 'a-chaz-Ya-hu of Ahaziah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3101><s%> yo-'Ash Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲחַזְיָ֗ה <S%H274><s%> 'a-chaz-Yah, of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <S%H1589><s%> vat-tig-No and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִתּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> mit-Toch him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king's; הַמַּמֹותְתִים ham-ma-mot-tim כהַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <S%H4191><s%> ham-Mu-ma-Tim, put קאֹת֥וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et מֵינִקְתּ֖וֹ <S%H3243><s%> mei-nik-To him [even] him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <S%H2315><s%> ba-cha-Dar chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <S%H4296><s%> ham-mit-Tot; bed וַיַּסְתִּ֧רוּ <S%H5641><s%> vai-yas-Ti-ru and they hid אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H6271><s%> 'a-tal-Ya-hu Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo were being הוּמָֽת׃ <S%H4191><s%> hu-Mat. [which were] slain

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become אִתָּהּ֙ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tah her in בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <S%H2244><s%> mit-chab-Be And he was with her hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> shesh six שָׁנִ֑ים <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nim; years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <S%H6271><s%> va-'a-tal-Yah And Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4427><s%> mo-Le-chet did reign עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. over the land פ Peh

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> u-vash-sha-Nah year הַ֠שְּׁבִיעִית <S%H7637><s%> Hash-she-vi-'it And the seventh שָׁלַ֨ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent יְהוֹיָדָ֜ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח׀ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach and fetched אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei the rulers; הַמֵּאיֹות ham-me-yot כהַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot, hundred קלַכָּרִי֙ <S%H3746><s%> lak-ka-Ri with the captains וְלָ֣רָצִ֔ים <S%H7323><s%> ve-La-ra-Tzim, and the guard וַיָּבֵ֥א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve and brought אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֵלָ֖יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav to בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit them to him into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <S%H3772><s%> vai-yich-Rot and made לָהֶ֨ם <S%H1992><s%> la-Hem like בְּרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> be-Rit a covenant וַיַּשְׁבַּ֤ע <S%H7650><s%> vai-yash-Ba' with them and took an oath אֹתָם֙ <S%H854><s%> 'o-Tam in בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit of them in the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD וַיַּ֥רְא <S%H7200><s%> vai-Yar and shewed אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. them the king's

וַיְצַוֵּ֣ם <S%H6680><s%> vay-tzav-Vem And he commanded לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, them saying זֶ֥ה <S%H2088><s%> zeh This הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher you תַּעֲשׂ֑וּן <S%H6213><s%> ta-'a-Sun; that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֤ית <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shit A third part מִכֶּם֙ <S%H4480><s%> mik-Kem who בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ei of you that enter in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath וְשֹׁ֣מְרֵ֔י <S%H8104><s%> ve-Sho-me-Rei, shall even be keepers מִשְׁמֶ֖רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret of the watch בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit house הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. of the king's

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit And a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <S%H8179><s%> be-Sha-'ar [shall be] at the gate ס֔וּר <S%H5495><s%> Sur, of Sur וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֥ית <S%H7992><s%> ve-hash-she-li-Shit and a third part בַּשַּׁ֖עַר <S%H8179><s%> bash-Sha-'ar at the gate אַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char behind הָרָצִ֑ים <S%H7323><s%> ha-ra-Tzim; the guard וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֛ם <S%H8104><s%> u-she-mar-Tem so shall ye keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the watch הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the house מַסָּֽח׃ <S%H4535><s%> mas-Sach. that it be not broken down

וּשְׁתֵּ֤י <S%H8147><s%> u-she-Tei And two הַיָּדוֹת֙ <S%H3027><s%> hai-ya-dOt parts בָּכֶ֔ם ba-Chem, כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol of you all יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei of all you that go forth הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat; on the sabbath וְשָֽׁמְר֛וּ <S%H8104><s%> ve-sha-me-Ru even they shall keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <S%H4931><s%> mish-Me-ret the watch בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- about הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king

וְהִקַּפְתֶּ֨ם <S%H5362><s%> ve-hik-kaf-Tem And ye shall compass עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv, round about אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> ve-che-Lav with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> ve-hab-Ba and he that cometh אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- within הַשְּׂדֵר֖וֹת <S%H7713><s%> has-se-de-Rot within the ranges יוּמָ֑ת <S%H4191><s%> yu-Mat; let him be slain וִהְי֥וּ <S%H1961><s%> vih-Yu become אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- and be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech and be ye with the king בְּצֵאת֥וֹ <S%H3318><s%> be-tze-To as he goeth out וּבְבֹאֽוֹ׃ <S%H935><s%> u-ve-vo-'O. and as he cometh in

וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֞וּ <S%H6213><s%> vai-ya-'a-Su did שָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei And the captains; הַמֵּאיֹות ham-me-yot כהַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot, hundred קכְּכֹ֣ל <S%H3605><s%> ke-Chol to all אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after צִוָּה֮ <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' according to all [things] that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Chu and they took אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <S%H376><s%> 'a-na-Shav, one בָּאֵ֣י <S%H935><s%> ba-'Ei that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat, on the sabbath עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> 'im were to יֹצְאֵ֣י <S%H3318><s%> yo-tze-'Ei with them that should go out הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <S%H7676><s%> hash-shab-Bat; on the sabbath וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo-'u and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <S%H3077><s%> ye-ho-ya-Da' to Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵֽן׃ <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen. the priest

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten give הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen did the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> le-sa-Rei And to the captains; הַמֵּאיֹות ham-me-yot כהַמֵּאֹ֗ות <S%H3967><s%> ham-me-'ot, hundred קאֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַחֲנִית֙ <S%H2595><s%> ha-cha-Nit spears וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <S%H7982><s%> hash-she-la-Tim, and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech king דָּוִ֑ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid; David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בְּבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit that [were] in the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּעַמְד֨וּ <S%H5975><s%> vai-ya-'am-Du stood הָרָצִ֜ים <S%H7323><s%> ha-ra-Tzim And the guard אִ֣ישׁ׀ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <S%H3627><s%> ve-che-Lav with his weapons בְּיָד֗וֹ <S%H3027><s%> be-ya-Do, in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <S%H3802><s%> mik-Ke-tef corner הַבַּ֤יִת <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <S%H3233><s%> hay-ma-Nit from the right עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against כֶּ֤תֶף <S%H3802><s%> Ke-tef corner הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <S%H8042><s%> has-se-ma-Lit, to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <S%H4196><s%> lam-miz-Be-ach [along] by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <S%H1004><s%> ve-lab-Ba-yit; and the temple עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king סָבִֽיב׃ <S%H5439><s%> sa-Viv. round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <S%H3318><s%> vai-yo-Tzi And he brought forth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, the king's וַיִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten and put עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <S%H5145><s%> han-Ne-zer the crown וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <S%H5715><s%> ha-'e-Dut, upon him and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֥כוּ <S%H4427><s%> vai-yam-Li-chu and they made him king אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֑הוּ <S%H4886><s%> vai-yim-sha-Chu-hu; and anointed וַיַּכּוּ־ <S%H5221><s%> vai-yak-ku- him and they clapped כָ֔ף <S%H3709><s%> Chaf, their hands וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <S%H559><s%> vai-yo-me-Ru and said יְחִ֥י <S%H2421><s%> ye-Chi God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king ס sa-Mek

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vat-tish-Ma' heard עֲתַלְיָ֔ה <S%H6271><s%> 'a-tal-Yah, And when Athaliah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- ק֥וֹל <S%H6963><s%> Kol the noise הָֽרָצִ֖ין <S%H7323><s%> ha-ra-Tzin of the guard הָעָ֑ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am; [and] of the people וַתָּבֹ֥א <S%H935><s%> vat-ta-Vo she came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הָעָ֖ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am to the people בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD
